function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of planning and resource allocation may decrease system resilience to disruptive events and impede recovery.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to disruptive events and slower recovery from them.","Mitigation":"Implement proper planning and resource allocation strategies to enhance resilience.","Technologies":"Resilience optimization models, network interdiction formulation, and project scheduling models.","People":"Infrastructure planners, policymakers, and system operators.","Owner":"Infrastructure planning and policy implementation organizations."},{"Description":"Interdependencies among infrastructure systems can impact the resilience of other systems.","Impact":"Failure to recognize interdependencies may lead to inadequate planning and preparation for operation.","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth assessment of interdependent systems and develop standards for resilient interdependent systems.","Technologies":"Interdependent infrastructure models and standards for resilient interdependent systems.","People":"Infrastructure planners, system operators, and policymakers.","Owner":"Infrastructure planning and policy implementation organizations."}]}
